survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Coffee Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction levels with subscription-based coffee services, focusing on delivery reliability, product quality, and overall service experience.

questions.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to our coffee service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Helps segment respondents by tenure.

script.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to our coffee service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the coffee you receive?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the coffee you receive?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of our service do you value the most? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key value drivers. Limit selection to 3 options.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of our service do you value the most? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any issues with your coffee delivery?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge problem frequency. Single-choice.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any issues with your coffee delivery?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the issue you encountered.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q4 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture detailed feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the issue you encountered.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q4 answer is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our coffee subscription service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale for Net Promoter Score (NPS) calculation. Single-choice.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our coffee subscription service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your subscription experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your subscription experience?
